Subject: Ramadan Kareem | Our Working Schedule & Vision 2033: Bridging Horizons
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=368&user=10620> 	

This Ramadan, we celebrate the harmony of togetherness; we celebrate the strength of our community through our past, our present, and the future we are creating.
May this Holy Month inspire us to grow and collaborate as one harmonious symphony.


Ramadan Kareem from ours to yours!

Click to find our Ramadan Working Schedule here  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=368&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ebd9227c89ee8ca132fc1ae2cc6df1471109202900.png>

As we look to the future, our Vision 2033, "Bridging Horizons," serves as both our strategic roadmap and a call to action. This vision bridges the achievements of the past with the limitless possibilities of the future, underscoring our commitment to innovation, collaboration, and staying true to the foundational principles that have driven our success.

Find out more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=369&user=10620> 

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=370&user=10620>
